about_the_game:
Set the stage for the zombie apocalypse with these thirty new tracks from composer Joel Steudler! Shambling dead will dig in and dine on the festering fears of your game's players with this scary soundtrack. Macabre music events and sinister SFX complete the Mega-Pack, fully equipping you to bring the doom!

Features:

- 30 BGM tracks suitable for battle, dungeons, themes, and towns!
- 13 unlucky MEs (Musical Events) to set the mood.
- 30 sound effects including bites, splats, squishes, and scrapes.
- .ogg format included.
- Royalty free music to use in your RPG Maker VX Ace projects.

Tracklist:

1 - Battle - No Escape
2 - Battle - Stop Chasing Me
3 - Battle - Trust Nobody
4 - Dead - Raging Dead
5 - Dead - Relentless Dead
6 - Dead - Restless Dead
7 - Dead - Return Of The Dead
8 - Dead - Risen Dead
9 - Dead - Rotting Dead
10 - Dungeon - Creepy Corridors
11 - Dungeon - Definitely Disquieting
12 - Dungeon - No Time
13 - Dungeon - Serial Killer Mentality
14 - Dungeon - Ugly Undercurrents
15 - Theme - Beating Heart Attack
16 - Theme - Evil Residents
17 - Theme - Jump Scares
18 - Theme - Old School Scary
19 - Theme - Spiritology
20 - Town - Ghost Hunt
21 - Town - Grave Robbers
22 - Town - Not Quite Right
23 - Town - Searching For Survivors
24 - Zombie - Brain Eaters
25 - Zombie - Hiding From Zombies
26 - Zombie - Zombie Apocalypse
27 - Zombie - Zombie Food
28 - Zombie - Zombie Graveyard
29 - Zombie - Zombie Hunt
30 - Zombie - Zombie Rampage

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *:Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / 7 (32-bit/64-bit)
  • Processor:Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Memory:512 MB RAM
  • Graphics:1024 x 768 pixels or higher desktop resolution
  • Hard Drive:400 MB HD space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor:Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Memory:512 MB RAM

short_description: Raise the dead with thirty tracks of tense, terrifying tunes for your game! A dreadful atmosphere is essential for any horror setting, and the assorted anxieties in this second Survival Horror volume will fan the flames of fear for your players.
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Italian, Portuguese - Brazil, Japanese
